long_description: Windproof, warm, lightweight and very compressible, the Nano Puff vest is an ideal insulation layer under a shell and doubles as a stand-alone wind barrier in warmer conditions. 60g PrimaLoft One(R) insulation provides excellent warmth and compressibility and will continue to insulate even in damp conditions. Recycled ripstop polyester glides effortlessly when worn as a mid or outer layer; Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Classic brick quilting pattern through the torso and waist with narrow horizontal quilting at side panels adds shape; burly thread adds durability. Shaping through the torso and waist enhances the fit. Soft, wicking interior stormflap; zipper garage; drawcord droptail hem; 2 zippered handwarmer pockets. Internal chest pocket, with clip-in loop, doubles as a stuff sack. The women's Patagonia Nano Puff vest has a regular fit.
short_description: Windproof, warm, lightweight and very compressible, the Nano Puff vest is an ideal insulation layer under a shell and doubles as a stand-alone wind barrier in warmer conditions.
